pullRequest.title: Added usage message in httpsinfo extension
pullRequest.bodyText:
I tried to follow the steps provided by thc202 to solve DCO check and Travis CI check.
Fix zaproxy/zaproxy#6113

nodes.bodyText: This should be reverted, you might need to configure the IDE to not automatically do this change.

It's simpler if the same panel is returned for both cases, we can make use of the CardLayout to swap between the usage and the results panels. In which case we would no longer need UsagePanel, it would be simply a JPanel.
The usage should be shown after a new session.
This needs to be internationalised, i.e. add the message to the Messages.properties file and then get it with Constant.messages.getString(...).

beforeCommit.message:
Added usage message to httpsinfo extension and added the null check

Signed-off-by: Infernalbronco <akshay.98mall@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
Added usage message in Httpsinfo extension

Show panel with usage message when there are no results shown.

Signed-off-by: Infernalbronco <akshay.98mall@gmail.com>
